pages.text: $(l)Influential Blocks$() $(br)$(li)Bone Block$(li)Slime Block$(li)Wet Sponge$(li)Glowstone$(li)Pearlescent Froglight$(li)Ochre Froglight$(li)Verdant Froglight$(li)Shroomlight

The following array of numbers lists the amount of potential block values required for this gem to emerge. Please note that this is a rough estimate and your results will vary.$(br)[360, 50, 25, 0, 0, 50]
This gem can be injected with a tier 2 injector setup.
